attributes.action: Britain needs to stop bully boy tactics against Russia.
attributes.additional_details: British people are tired of being dragged into conflicts that do not concern us.  We used to be a strong 'Good' country yet at the moment it seems we are nothing more than a bully boy willing to do the USA bidding. Stop playing god with our troops lives, this is not our concern. I might remind you that there is a 2020 election, fail in our requests this time around and you will see the result in that election. http://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/752678/britain-launch-official-anti-russian-witch-hunt-vladimir-putin-london-embassy-theresa-may
attributes.background: British people are sick and tired of our Government constantly provoking Russia. The USA are strategically placing their troops 'Around' Russia in a very aggressive manner and we like fools are following in line like a puppet. When will you ask what we want? Enough!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
